title: Natural Deodorant by nasanta - Australian Made - Aluminum Free Deodorant - Unscented For Men and Women - Healthy Magnesium Formula - Clinically Tested for Sensitive Skin - 80 mL 2.7 Fl Oz - Roll on
description: You need magnesium for energy production, nerve transmission, protein synthesis, muscle relaxation, and multiple other body functions. More than another natural deodorant, nasanta is formulated with healthy magnesium from Japan. You can relax knowing that there are no hidden aluminum compounds in nasanta. Common aluminum molecules in other natural deodorants include ingredients like potassium alum (potassium double sulphate of aluminum) and zirconium alum. Your underarms will not sting on application even right after shaving. nasanta was clinically tested by Dermatest Labs in Sydney for sensitization evaluation and is free of irritating ingredients like alcohol (ethanol) and sodium bicarbonate (baking soda). nasanta is not a chemistry experiment. nasanta is formulated by cosmetic professionals and made in Sydney, Australia in a GMP and ISO certified facility, with every batch coded and tested for antimicrobial preservative efficacy and stability. • 80 mL roll-on lasts 3+ months • Non staining • Ethyl Alcohol free • 100% aluminum free • Animal testing free • Animal and animal-derived ingredients free • Baking soda free • BPA free • Essential oil free • GMO free • Gluten free • Nanoparticle free • Palm oil free • Paraben free • Propylene glycol free • Talc free • Triclosan free
